MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KY12 postcode area of Dunfermline. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 4:36pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of difficulties getting to site and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:11 PM on Thursday, 24 December 2020.
